source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a landscape scenery shot featuring a breathtaking aerial view of a massive, flat-topped mountain, known as a tepui. Its surface is covered in vibrant green vegetation and is uniquely split by a central crevice from which a spectacular waterfall plunges into the deep, shadowed canyon below, with the surrounding vista filled with rolling green mountains fading into a hazy horizon. There is no main subject because the focus is on the immense scale and majestic beauty of the natural environment itself. The shot's purpose is to convey the awe-inspiring atmosphere of the location, with the unique geological formation and waterfall serving as the central elements of the composition.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a landscape scenery shot featuring a breathtaking aerial view of a massive, flat-topped mountain, known as a tepui. Its surface is covered in vibrant green vegetation and is uniquely split by a central crevice from which a spectacular waterfall plunges into the deep, shadowed canyon below, with the surrounding vista filled with rolling green mountains fading into a hazy horizon. There is no main subject because the focus is on the immense scale and majestic beauty of the natural environment itself. The shot's purpose is to convey the awe-inspiring atmosphere of the location, with the unique geological formation and waterfall serving as the central elements of the composition.

generated_critique: While the caption correctly identifies the main geographical features as an aerial view of a tepui with a waterfall, it relies heavily on subjective and emotional language such as "breathtaking," "spectacular," "majestic beauty," and "awe-inspiring," which the instructions explicitly forbid. The final two sentences are also overly analytical, explaining the shot's purpose and justifying the lack of a main subject rather than simply describing the visual content. The description could be improved by adding more specific, objective details that would likely be visible in such a video. For instance, instead of "vibrant green vegetation," it could specify "a dense carpet of dark green, low-lying scrub covering the rocky plateau." The waterfall itself could be described more concretely, such as "a single, narrow plume of white water that falls from the central crevice and dissipates into a thick cloud of mist before reaching the canyon floor." Furthermore, the "deep, shadowed canyon" could be detailed with "sheer, dark, wet rock faces," and the "hazy horizon" could be clarified as "a sea of low-hanging white clouds partially obscuring the peaks of distant mountains." A more effective caption would eliminate the subjective praise and analytical conclusion, focusing instead on a direct and detailed visual account of the landscape's components.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: The video captures an aerial view of a massive, flat-topped mountain known as a tepui. Its rocky plateau is covered with a dense carpet of dark green, low-lying scrub. A single, narrow plume of white water cascades from a central crevice, dissipating into a thick cloud of mist before reaching the canyon floor. The canyon is characterized by sheer, dark, wet rock faces. Surrounding the tepui, rolling green mountains extend into the distance, partially obscured by a sea of low-hanging white clouds.
